trans-unit.source: Provides methods for constructing plural and singular forms of words.
trans-unit.target: Fornece métodos para construir as formas singulares e plural das palavras.

trans-unit.source: The PluralizationService class applies English rules for constructing plural and singular forms of words.
trans-unit.target: A classe PluralizationService aplica regras em inglês para construir as formas singulares e plural das palavras.

trans-unit.source: To extend the service to other languages, use the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> on the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> class.
trans-unit.target: Para estender o serviço para outros idiomas, use o <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService>sobre a <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator>classe.</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> </xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService"></xref> that applies language rules that correspond to the specified <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService"> </xref> que aplica regras de idioma que correspondem a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> especificado

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService> class applies English rules for constructing plural and singular forms of words.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService>classe se aplica as regras para construir as formas singulares e plural das palavras em inglês.</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService>

trans-unit.source: To extend the service to other languages, use the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> on the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> class.
trans-unit.target: Para estender o serviço para outros idiomas, use o <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService>sobre a <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator>classe.</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> </xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> that corresponds to the language rules applied for singular and plural forms of words.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>que corresponde às regras de idioma aplicadas para as formas singulares e plurais das palavras.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The newly created <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Recém-criado <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService"></xref> culture.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService"> </xref> cultura.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService> class applies English rules for constructing plural and singular forms of words.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService>classe se aplica as regras para construir as formas singulares e plural das palavras em inglês.</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService>

trans-unit.source: To extend the service to other languages, use the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> on the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> class.
trans-unit.target: Para estender o serviço para outros idiomas, use o <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService>sobre a <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator>classe.</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> </xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService>

trans-unit.source: An object that specifies which language rules to apply for singulars and plurals.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que especifica qual idioma regras se aplicam a singulars e plurais.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified word is plural.
trans-unit.target: Determina se a palavra especificada é plural.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService> class applies English rules for constructing plural and singular forms of words.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService>classe se aplica as regras para construir as formas singulares e plural das palavras em inglês.</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService>

trans-unit.source: To extend the service to other languages, use the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> on the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> class.
trans-unit.target: Para estender o serviço para outros idiomas, use o <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService>sobre a <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator>classe.</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> </xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService>

trans-unit.source: Both the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsPlural%2A> and <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsSingular%2A> methods can return `true` for the same word.
trans-unit.target: Tanto o <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsPlural%2A>e <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsSingular%2A>métodos podem retornar `true` para a mesma palavra.</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsSingular%2A> </xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsPlural%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, both methods will return `true` for the word "fish".
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, os dois métodos retornará `true` para a palavra "fish".

trans-unit.source: The value to be analyzed.
trans-unit.target: O valor a ser analisado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the word is plural; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a palavra for plural; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified word is singular.
trans-unit.target: Determina se a palavra especificada for singular.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService> class applies English rules for constructing plural and singular forms of words.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService>classe se aplica as regras para construir as formas singulares e plural das palavras em inglês.</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService>

trans-unit.source: To extend the service to other languages, use the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> on the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> class.
trans-unit.target: Para estender o serviço para outros idiomas, use o <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService>sobre a <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator>classe.</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> </xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService>

trans-unit.source: Both the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsSingular%2A> and <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsPlural%2A> methods can return `true` for the same word.
trans-unit.target: Tanto o <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsSingular%2A>e <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsPlural%2A>métodos podem retornar `true` para a mesma palavra.</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsPlural%2A> </xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService.IsSingular%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, both methods will return `true` for the word "fish".
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, os dois métodos retornará `true` para a palavra "fish".

trans-unit.source: The value to be analyzed.
trans-unit.target: O valor a ser analisado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the word is singular; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a palavra for singular; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the plural form of the specified word
trans-unit.target: Retorna a forma plural da palavra especificada

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService> class applies English rules for constructing plural and singular forms of words.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService>classe se aplica as regras para construir as formas singulares e plural das palavras em inglês.</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService>

trans-unit.source: To extend the service to other languages, use the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> on the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> class.
trans-unit.target: Para estender o serviço para outros idiomas, use o <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService>sobre a <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator>classe.</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> </xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService>

trans-unit.source: The word to be made plural.
trans-unit.target: A palavra a ser feita no plural.

trans-unit.source: The plural form of the input parameter.
trans-unit.target: A forma plural do parâmetro de entrada.

trans-unit.source: Returns the singular form of the specified word.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a forma singular da palavra especificada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService> class applies English rules for constructing plural and singular forms of words.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService>classe se aplica as regras para construir as formas singulares e plural das palavras em inglês.</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService>

trans-unit.source: To extend the service to other languages, use the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService> on the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> class.
trans-unit.target: Para estender o serviço para outros idiomas, use o <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService>sobre a <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator>classe.</xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator> </xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator.PluralizationService>

trans-unit.source: The word to be made singular.
trans-unit.target: A palavra a ser feita singular.

trans-unit.source: The singular form of the input parameter.
trans-unit.target: A forma singular de parâmetro de entrada.
